title: Name That Threat Group
description: We detected an attack using the following hash: ,'e7457a369d943b77648fc121e54728a3862740f8b4d7337ec15b8d0067244735'. Search for this hash on a threat intelligence platform (VirusTotal). The flag is the number of security vendors that ag this as malicious.
hints: Go to virustotal.com and search for the le hash.
Look at the 'Detection' tab to see how many vendors flagged it.
The flag format is FLAG{number} where number is the detection count.
